attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This app may be the worst thing to ever be downloaded on my phone. My phone was sexually assaulted after I downloaded it to my phone.

attributes.title: GAVE MY DOG CANCER
attributes.review: My very healthy dog 🐶 went to the vet the day 🌞 after I got this app. They found out she had cancer😱!!! She was totally healthy till I got this app😡. Now I have less storage space and a dead 💀 dog 🐕!

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: An attempt to take away the rights of marginalized communities like my own. It caused my phone to crash along with my sanity, and has been since 2016.

attributes.title: Terrible App!! 🧡😦🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: Was looking for a family friendly news source but instead my phone has been spammed with raciest, sexist, homophobia from a Cheeto goblin who wear his tie past his crotch.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app make you have horrible poops for days and it makes you feel very sad. it never helped me once and i am VERY disappointed.

attributes.title: I hate it here
attributes.review: I only downloaded this app so I could leave a bad review to lower the rating of the app in general and hopefully get it removed from the AppStore ❤️

attributes.title: Terrible app!!!!
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP! I repeat DO NOT!! I was scrolling trynna you know support y’all president and the app LITERALLY came out of the screen and punched me in the FACE we had a wholeeee fight i won ofcourse but yaaa i got a black eye now. It even KICKED MY DOG!

attributes.title: WORST APP
attributes.review: This app gave ALL of my contacts and personal information to the LIBS. whoever’s running it is destroying my life, my phone and this country!!!! I would rate it 1/5 if I could

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: i got this to be able to keep up with the updates on his rallies but it destroyed my phone. literally. my phone keeps bugging out. nothing loads anymore. the only app that works is this one???all i wanted to do was see when the rallies were so i could know where to avoid going

attributes.title: Best APP for the best President
attributes.review: Trump APP is the best and so Is he! So glad I downloaded it!
